Texts.Chs: 今天我们的断翅议会联络员来了，一笔到位的贿赂确保我不必和其他人共用一个房间。现在我不用再担心居心不良者深夜来访了。接下来，我给村子外的人发了信，他将会传达一个非常重要的信息。
Texts.Eng: Our Clipped Council liaison came by today, and a well-placed bribe ensured I won't have to be sharing a room with the others. No more worrying about late-night visits. Next, I sent word to my man outside the village; he is to deliver a message of great importance.

Texts.Chs: 然后，我们的精神历练开始了。我轻而易举地超过了其他人，因为我的身心我所会的。我的头脑从未如此敏锐。我可以看到他们愤怒地盯着我，只是希望我成功，然后盘算着当我成功的时候他们如何对付我。他们将会有一场无知的觉醒。
Texts.Eng: Then, our mental training began. I outclassed the others with ease, as I knew I would. My mind is the sharpest it has ever been. I could see them staring at me, angrily, just willing me to succeed, planning what they'd do to me when I did. They're going to have a rude awakening.
